# Teams

Teams are an incredibly powerful part of Solidrock that enable event organisers to book in and manage teams at their events.

Within the teams management area event organisers can:

  1. Create and manage the individual teams
  2. Set and manage team leaders
  3. Create and manage team member access levels
  4. Set approval critera to determine the steps required for a person to be approved as a team member.
